Burger cooking is a conventional game. The game has a restaurant look. It will be fun for you to play this game and you will love it. There is no hard and fast rule to play this game.

The customers enter the restaurant and stand in a queue. There are two shelves, one has burgers and other has sandwiches. Then you (the cook) have to take their orders and spoof the burgers and sandwiches in the oven according to their need. You should be quick to make their order, and serve them one by one. After that, collect the money from them and wash the dishes. As fast as you will be, you can collect much money, and proceed to the next level.
